short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight a drug name on any website to get a description including the drug's other names, drug class, and what it may treat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight an unknown drug name with your cursor, and press the shortcut buttons (Windows: ALT+P, Mac: CMD-SHIFT-P) to get the drug's other name, the drug class, and what it may treat. It uses National Institute of Health's NCBI API, so it includes over 100s of drugs with quick response time. Useful for web surfers to pharmacologist students. Click extension to get recently searched drugs.
